ComicInfo.Summary:
There can be only one... only one all-new, action-packed, monthly comic book series starring the Immortal Highlander!
As our creative team takes a rest from the first explosive story arc, writer Brandon Jerwa is joined by Kevin (ARMY OF DARKNESS) Sharpe for a special New Year's Eve tale of immortal love... and loss! Also featuring the first DYNAMITE COMICS appearance of Duncan MacLeod!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Gregory Homs | 1 | B | Cover B | Pat Lee | 2 | C | Cover C | Dave Dorman | 3 | RI | Retailer Incentive - Black-and-White Sketch Cover | Gregory Homs | Missing |
